name: top down pvz(plants vs zombies)ver 1.0
description:
if you press space on tittle it just throws you into easy so press any other key

i don't own pvz and the music/sounds ea does

game press c to place mine and 0 to plant sun and 1 to plant plant max is 3

()test mode controls g to spawn power up k for power up frenzy n to spawn zombie m for zombie frenzy j to kill all zombies also e to spawn cone zombies f for bucket zombies q for sheild zombie r for big boy zombie (other keys will be asigned soon)(lol sorry i made mouse invis)
